articles.author: Nectar Gan
articles.title: China's Xi visits South Africa in just his second trip abroad this year as domestic woes bubble back home - CNN
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping heads to South Africa Monday on a trip intended to bolster Beijing’s influence among developing and emerging nations, as ties with the United States remain deeply strained and economic troubles bubble up at home.

articles.title: BRICS Summit: Will PM Modi meet China's Xi Jinping in South Africa. What we know | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's schedule for bilateral meetings at the BRICS Summit in South Africa is still being developed
